original: Kroon, Karl Anders Ivar, kyrkoherde, Värends-Nöbbele, f. 16/4/05 i Sten-brohult, Kronob. 1., av kyrkoh. Jo^sef K. o. Ingeborg Pontén. G. 35 m. Karin Ohlsson. Barn: Kerstin f. 36, Gunilla 37, Ingrid 43. — Stud:ex. i Växjö 24, teol. fil. ex. i Lund 26, teol. kand. samt prakt. teol. prov 29, prästv. f. Växjö stift 30. Tjg. som past:adj. i Göteryd, v. pastor i Hälleberga samt v. kommin. o. kommin. i Markaryd, kyrkoh. i Nöbbele sed. 45.
translated:
Kroon, Karl Anders Ivar, parish priest, Värends-Nöbbele, born on April 16, 1905 in Stenbrohult, Kronob. 1st son of parish priest Josef K. and Ingeborg Pontén. Married in 1935 to Karin Ohlsson. Children: Kerstin born in 1936, Gunilla in 1937, Ingrid in 1943. 

Education: Completed high school in Växjö in 1924, received a Bachelor of Theology degree from Lund in 1926, completed a Master of Theology degree and practical theological examination in 1929, ordained as a priest for Växjö diocese in 1930. 

Worked as a temporary assistant pastor in Göteryd, then as a deputy pastor in Hälleberga, and as an assistant vicar and vicar in Markaryd. Since 1945, he has been the parish priest in Nöbbele.
